repos.excerpt:
bUp - CLI

A basic CLI tool to back up folders as zip files on your Windows PC.

Note: This is a personal project and may not cover all edge cases. Use at your own risk.

CLI Commands

bUp provides several terminal commands to manage folder backups. Each command can be invoked using its full name or its first letter.

  • bup add OR bup a
  • bup del OR bup d
  • bup list OR bup l
  • bup set OR bup s
  • bup run OR bup r
Enhance your Netflix binge-watching with BingeFlix, a Chrome extension that lets you skip intros and seamlessly move to the next episode for uninterrupted viewing pleasure.
Portfolio website built with React and Typescript showcasing my projects, with a Python tool for easy data updates and new project page generation.
This Discord bot keeps track of movies to watch for groups, using the OMDB API to save and show movie information. It also uses ChatGPT to have fun conversations and make comments like Adam Sandler.
"Hivemind" is a game project in C# using MonoGame, featuring robots collecting ores in a procedurally generated world.
Scrappy is a Python bot that scrapes job postings from LinkedIn, filtering out irrelevant ones and sending job details via Telegram messages. It simulates human browsing behavior to avoid detection.
